title: Robofriends
description: This project I used React and Javascript. I used the API (https://robohash.org/) for the random robot image and the API (https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users) for the data information.

title: Dream Nails By Lidi Nikolova
description: This website was created for a girl from Cyprus, who ultimately didn't put the website online.The website has been written in Italian, Russian, Bulgarian, Greek and English. I use google fonts, font awesome and Materialize framework.

title: Demo Landing Page
description: This is simple landing page. I translated in Italian and Bulgarian languages. For this progect I use Javascript, Html, Css and Materialize modern framework

title: Simple website page for restaurant
description: This project is simple page where you can choose from the menu and order via WhatsApp or pay immediately. The project written in Italian. For this project I use Javascrip, Html and Css.

title: Butterfly Tech Creative Solution
description: This project is my first personal website. I make project in Javascrip, Html and Css. I written project in English and translated in Italian and German. For this project I use Javascrip, Html and Css.

title: The Flying Bird Game
description: The game is create in Unity 2D with scrips in C#. The background changes based on the time. If it is day and the color is light blue, however if it is evening the color becomes blue.

title: Italy Game
description: The game is create in Unity 2D with scrips in C#. This game is in Italian where you can practice missing vowels, articles, double letters and much more. It was created for first graders.

title: The Mathematic Game
description: The game is create in Unity 2D with scrips in C#. This is simple game where have addition, substract, multiplication and division.

title: Phonebook
description: This Desktop Application project is a simple phonebook, where you can calculate the age,zodiac sign of the contact, has notifications for each contact's birthday, and than export to HTML format. The Application is create with C#, Windows Form in Visual Studio. I don't use databases SQL, but it creates a database folder in the user's PC with two folders inside - one for pictures with ID's contact, and one for each contact creating an HTML format.

title: Calculator
description: This Desktop Application is a simple Calculator with multiplication functions, temperature calculation and scientific calculator. The Application is create with C#, Windows Form in Visual Studio.

title: Note
description: This Desktop Application is a simple Note Block where you can then write, print, save and open txt files. The Application is create with C#, Windows Form in Visual Studio.
